about_the_game:
Axe Ghost is a brain-busting, turn-based, score-attack battle built around a fiercely competitive Daily Challenge.

Each run lasts around 20 minutes when you get good. The weapons dealt let you push, swap, freeze, magnetize and destroy the advancing monsters before they reach the bottom of the grid. Group them cleverly - the more monsters you destroy in a single attack, the more each one is worth. Accept optional constraints in the form of Quests to multiply your score. Spend Coins to play extra cards in critical moments.

Eventually Garnemar, the loathsome leader, appears. He's only vulnerable when surrounded on four sides by the same type of monster - a final test of your tactical ingenuity. Defeat him before the accursed robots overrun the battlefield and the timer runs out.


  • Pure Tactical Challenge Every weapon has a distinct purpose - from the devastating Axe to subtle board manipulation tools.

  • Daily Competition Each day is a new shared puzzle and chance to beat your peers in a bite-sized cognitive work-out.

  • Strategic Depth Can you afford to build the group even larger? Do the weapons in the next hand allow you to fend off the horde a little longer? Every turn demands that you manage risk/reward.

  • Hone Your Skills Learn the ropes in the Tutorial and Path to Readiness stages. Practice without limit in Free Play mode.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible with at least 128 MB
